attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: I wanted notifications on the current president ( not mine) and I keep getting notifications about it trying to snatch my booty? I’m really scared because it already stole my microwave and I think I’m next so 10/10 would NOT recommend.

attributes.title: It’s not worth your storage hunny 😒
attributes.review: Don’t even let me start this app is horrible …first of all it’s for someone who doesn’t care abt the BLM movement and calls us savages …also it glitches and laggy and upright horrible …so don’t waste your time it’s not worth it ....... PERIOD

attributes.title: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE🤮
attributes.review: when i opened the app i got a really bad virus a orange orangutan goblin was on my screen it was very scary. i then proceeded more and saw the same orangutan cheeto puff alien on my phone i thought this app was gonna be just like any other app instead now i have a new sleep paralysis demon🤧😣.

attributes.title: make america great again by getting this man out of the white house
attributes.review: this app is the absolute worst. doesn’t function well, has an inappropriate meaning. i mean how can the app store be okay with letting a racist misogynist cheeto looking man have an app. not to mention he’s a predator and being a female this app makes me uncomfortable. i think it would be in everyone’s best interest if this app were removed from the app store immediately to protect the well being of this country.

attributes.title: This app made me throw up and gave me a headache
attributes.review: The orange looking man looked so much like a Cheeto (which I’m allergic too) it made me throw up. I’m surprised I’m even alive because as I was trying to stop myself from looking THE APP LITERALLY SENT ME A NOTIFICATION I almost died. I AINT HAVE NO SHOES OR JOTHING I RAN FOR MY LIFE. Never again will I download or open this app.

attributes.title: eat the cheeto
attributes.review: this man is already the worst thing to happen to the country, so i guess i should've known this app would've been the worst thing to happen to my phone, but i guess i was optimistic. ever since i downloaded this app, my phone keeps glitching, the app crashes every time it's opened, and donny j cheeto keeps appearing in my nightmares. if this continues to happen, i'll have to report the app to my therapist as a trigger of my anxiety and depression. please do better, apple.

attributes.title: 0/10 would not recommend
attributes.review: As soon as I open the app my whole house hacked!🙀The lights turned red! 🟥 in the microwave and TV started talking!🔈😵even my phone started to stink!🤢😖 AND MY DISHWASHER RAN AWAY !!!!!😭💀 this app is horrible and should be taking AppStore so no one else has to suffer!😤😿👎

attributes.title: Ummmm.... no
attributes.review: Once I downloaded the app I go to check it out, and, omg I must of had a allergic reaction my eyes were screaming, what I saw was terrifying!!! It was a orange wearing a suit pointing up, and I was like ... 😲🥴🤢🤮. Take this app down, before other people have to suffer what I went through.

attributes.title: I’m scared
attributes.review: So basically I open the app to see a naked photo of a grizzly bear 🐻 then it forced me try and make me vote trump 2020 so basically Kanye west or Roddy rich 2020 cancel everyone on else and since I know your here from TikTok if you  make a dance video or sum dumb to juice wrlds new album imma kiss you on your forehead

attributes.title: horrible😳
attributes.review: this app is the worst app i have ever downloaded, I opened the app to see trumps nudes. that is not ok and it is very small👁👄👁 my dogs were sitting next to me whilst i looked at his cheeto body, and they started to viciously growl and bark. this app is not ok to even be on the App Store take it down.
